description:
Besides work, I like to code as a hobby!

That is why I've built some projects for fun in my free time and participated in quite a few events like Hackathons.

data.description:
An open-source software for beekeepers that provides scripts for recording data (such as weight or temperature), a powerful REST API for processing it and a dashboard for viewing it.

This was my first collaborative coding project that made it to production. We created it for our school's beekeeping club.
